message_history.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: I want to travel to London soon and I bought a London Pass.  Please help me find out which museums the London Pass currently provides free access to as of 2025. I need the museum, last entry time on weekends,  normal ticket price for one adult, and its specific address. I have no interest in sports so just skip the relevant museums.

Please present the information in one Markdown table with these column headers: Museum, Last Entry Time, Ticket Price (Pounds), and Address. 
Format the "Last Entry Time" like "4:00 pm".

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

To find out the museums covered by the London Pass and their details, I will search for current information about the pass and the museums it includes.

<search>London Pass museums free access 2025</search>

Search query: London Pass museums free access 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.museumslondon.org/london-pass):
Visit museums and properties for FREE with a London Pass: The London Pass currently provides free access and discounts on 36 of London's museums and 24 other popular attractions, tours and sights.

[Doc 2](https://londonpass.com/en/things-to-do/london-museums):
Top London Museums - Access included and more with The London ... Visiting Museums in London? Discover London's culture and history with access to Top London Museums and over 80 London attractions with the London Pass.

[Doc 3](https://londonpass.com/en):
The London Pass® | Save up to 50% on attractions Explore London with The London Pass®. Enjoy incredible savings and discover 90+ attractions, all on one digital credits package.

Based on these documents:

I will now locate specific details about museums accessible through London Pass:

<search>London Pass museums free access address</search>

Search query: London Pass museums free access address
Result: [Doc 1](https://londonpass.com/en/things-to-do/london-museums):
Top London Museums - Access included and more with The London ... Visiting Museums in London? Discover London's culture and history with access to Top London Museums and over 80 London attractions with the London Pass.

[Doc 2](https://www.museumslondon.org/london-pass):
Visit museums and properties for FREE with a London Pass: The London Pass currently provides free access and discounts on 36 of London's museums and 24 other popular attractions, tours and sights.

[Doc 3](https://londonpass.com/en/things-to-do/london-art-galleries):
London Art Galleries & Museums - Free Museums - The London Pass With an incredible selection of galleries featuring classic to modern art, see the best and enjoy free entry at top London art galleries with the London Pass.
